name: Pet of the Week – Noodles
description: Meet Noodles, an energetic Autralian shepherd mix who was recently adopted from our Bonita shelter and this week's Pet of the Week!

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Noodles, an energetic Autralian shepherd mix who was recently adopted from our Bonita shelter and this week’s Pet of the Week! If you’re in need of a furry friend to play with, visit www.SDDAC.com to learn more information about adopting from County animal shelters.
